devdoc.details: Our contract needs to support safeTransfers

bidAuction(uint256).details: External function to bid on a created auctionPayable as it receives ether

params._tokenERC721: which is the address of the deployed contract used to create our NFT
params._tokenId: tokenid of the NFT to auction

endAuction(uint256).details: Function for an auctioneer to end an auction

getAuctionInfo(uint256).details: External function to retrieve all the info of a specific auction

getNumberOfAuctions().details: External function to retrieve the current number of auctions already created

returns._nbOfAuctions: a number of auctions from the array

setContractERC721(address).details: Function called upon deployment of this contract and used to set a state variable to the deployed address of the ERC721 contract deployed in the deployment scriptcan only be called by original deployer

params._auctionERC721: address of ERC721 contract deployed as parameter

withdrawBid(uint256).details: Function to withdraw a bid once the auction is over

withdrawHighestBid(uint256).details: Function for the auctioneer to withdraw the highest bid once the auction is over

withdrawNft(uint256).details: Function to claim an NFT for a winner to be called once the auction is over
